column1: I am Malaysian visited Hokkaido from 9th to 20th February 2020. Will be travelling to Russia and reaching Irkutsk on 29th February. I am worry will I be allowed to enter Russia since I have less then 14 days quarantine period?Thanks for the reply and update info - if any.Edited: 10:23 pm, February 23, 2020
Currently Russia has no travel restrictions to those visited Japan...Enjoy!
You're fine, the only restriction is a temporary ban for Chinese Nationals to visit Russia. No other restrictions.Enjoy your trip!
Thank you for the reply and answers.
No travel restrictions for Japan at all. It is still a low-risk country, and as the epidemics appear to slow down, it's unlikely to get on a restricted list.
